publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-163 Christine Grahame: EIS Call for Ban on Armed Forces Recruitment—That the Parliament endorses the recent vote by the Educational Institute of Scotland (EIS), Scotland’s largest teaching union, in passing a motion calling for a ban on Army recruitment campaigns in all schools.
S3M-163 EIS Call for Ban on Armed Forces Recruitment (lodged on 12 June 2007) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-163 Christine Grahame: EIS Call for Ban on Armed Forces Recruitment—That the Parliament endorses the recent vote by the Educational Institute of Scotland (EIS), Scotland’s largest teaching union, in passing a motion calling for a ban on Army recruitment campaigns in all schools. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn
